content: onward do not work all m1r/m1l of the raglan incr on every rs row for the front and back sections work m1r/m1l for 3 rs row then skip 1 rs row for the sleeve sections work m1r/m1l for 1 rs row then skip 1 rs row after round 82 90 98 you should have 350 388 430 sts on your needle 51 56 62 front 1 raglan 72 81 90 sleeve 1 raglan 100 110 122 back 1 raglan 72 81 90 sleeve 1 raglan 51 56 62 front round 84 92 100 rs put sleeve sts on hold k front + raglan sts + back to shape the underarms co 5 sts between each raglan st pair using backwards loop co1 - 6 - b o dy continue working the body section in stockinette for 29 row or more if necessary the jacket should cover your chest if you want the jacket to be longer add the additional length now before starting the pockets end on a ws row pocket construction the pockets are not knitted separately but seamlessly starting from round 114 122 130 of the body piece to make row counting clearer the row counter is reset round 1 corresponds to round 114 122 130 - 7 - b o dy left pocket round 1 rs k first 25 28 31 sts and put the other sts on hold round 2 ws p these 25 28 31 sts continue working in stockinette round 15 rs k incr the st before the last st using the nearly invisible increase2 k1 continue working in stockinette while increasing the second-to-last st using the technique for nearly invisible increases in the following pattern 1 st every 4 row 4x round 15-30 1 st every 3 row 6x round 31-48 1 st every 2 row 6x round 49-60 on round 34 40 and 46 you will have to incr on the ws p first 2 sts of row insert the left needle from front to back into the st 2 row below the st you just worked purl this new st round 60 ws there should be 41 44 47 sts on your needles p until you got 3 sts left don t work them break yarn and put all sts of the pocket on hold right pocket pick up 25 28 31 of the main body sts put on hold starting from the right front side round 1 rs join yarn and k these sts beginning on the side opposite where the zipper will be attached continue working as for the left pocket on rs incr the second st on ws incr the second-to-last st round 60 ws p all sts break yarn and put them on hold -
